Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Risk \Risk\, v. t. [imp. & p. p. {Risked}; p. pr. & vb. n. {Risking}.] [CF. F. risquer. See {Risk}, n.] 1. To expose to risk, hazard, or peril; to venture; as, to risk goods on board of a ship; to risk one's person in battle; to risk one's fame by a publication. [1913 Webster]
2. To incur the risk or danger of; as, to risk a battle. [1913 Webster]
Syn: To hazard; peril; endanger; jeopard. [1913 Webster]
